name: Battle Car Wreck
description:
An exciting and exhilarating car combat game where you upgrade your cars and weapons to take on even stronger and faster enemy cars.

Free to play for as long as you like, containing voluntary in-app purchases to get more coins for faster access to more cars, weapons, upgrades.

Get on your armed car and make enemy cars wrecked!

Featuring:
- 9 player cars / 6 enemy cars
- 4 different weapon types; Minigun, Shotgun, Missile Launcher, Raygun
- 2 battlefields / 20 single campaign stages each

Follow us on:
Facebook: facebook.com/battlecarwreck
Twitter: @battlecarwreck
